_sText:
19:32  29 March 2008

Ever dreamed of killing someone with a flashbang or a smokegrenade? 
Well, here's your chance in this nice map! with textures from multiple famous maps.
Take a flashbang or smokegrenade out of the weapon dispencer or at the spawn, and throw it
to your enemy. Get one point for each kill. 
There's a timer wich counts to 60 (1 minute...) and after that everyone's that. so: no stupid campers
or stuff. They won't survive. 
I hope it's going to be succesfull, have fun!

Ivar van Wooning
Ingame: i3D.!\/4R


(note/tip: You spawn with 1 HP, a Flashbang or Smokegrenade does 1 Damage and can so kill you in one trow.)

(note/tip: You can add bots ingame with the bot_add_ct or bot_add_t command. Then you have funny, but easy enemy.)
